typeProperties.script:
source(output(
		UserId as string,
		FavoriteColor as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false,
	wildcardPaths:['horizontal/*.txt2']) ~> DataFlowSorce0630
DataFlowSorce0630 derive(FavoriteColor_split = split({FavoriteColor}, 'ï¼Œ')) ~> DerivedColumn1
DerivedColumn1 foldDown(unroll(FavoriteColor_split),
	mapColumn(
		UserId,
		FavoriteColor,
		FavoriteColor_split
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: false,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: false) ~> Flatten1
Flatten1 sink(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	partitionFileNames:['DataFlowOut0630.txt'],
	umask: 0022,
	preCommands: [],
	postCommands: [],
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true,
	partitionBy('hash', 1)) ~> DataFlowSink0630
